sense.def: Pathological Condition of dan du 丹毒 , cinnabar poison, with rashes of unclear red color brought forth by a combination of heat poison and wind cold. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 31: 白丹者，初發 癢痛，微虛腫，如吹，疹起不痛不赤面白色。由挾風冷，故使色白也 , “As for white cinnabar , in its early stages there is itching and pain, and a slight empty swelling, as if inflated. When papules rise there is no pain, and no redness, but the face assumes a white complexion. This is because wind cold is involved. This lets the color turn into white”. Bai dian 白癜 , white patches [12]

Pathological Condition identical with bai dian feng 白癜風 , white patches wind. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 31: 皮肉 色變白，與肉色不同，亦不癢痛，謂之白癜 , “When skin and flesh change color, and no longer resemble the color of flesh, and if there is neither itching nor pain, this is called ‘ white patches ’”.
